title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: lightweight, extensible framework for running Llama 2, Mistral, Gemma and other LLMs locally with a single CLI or REST API.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull and manage local models with a few lines of code.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node and browsers; same API surface as the Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use Ollama models as drop-in LLMs for chains, agents and RAG pipelines.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Open-source ChatGPT-style web UI that talks to your local Ollama instance; no data leaves your machine.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Rust-based interactive CLI wrapper around Ollama with syntax highlighting and chat history.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that turns any Ollama model into a GitHub-Copilot-like pair-programmer.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal reference implementation of retrieval-augmented generation using Ollama embeddings and Chroma vector store.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack 2.0 integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in production pipelines.

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/JVM client library for Ollama with Kotlin extensions; Spring Boot starters included.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: Community-maintained .NET SDK for Ollama supporting .NET 6+ and Blazor apps.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Production-ready Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU autoscaling.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official multi-arch Docker images (CPU & CUDA) with docker-compose examples.

title: ollama-nginx
summary: Reverse-proxy recipes for exposing Ollama via HTTPS with rate-limit and auth.

title: ollama-discord-bot
summary: Self-hostable Discord bot that lets servers chat with local Ollama models through slash commands.

title: ollama-slack-bot
summary: Slack Bolt app that adds /ollama slash command to query local models with ephemeral or public replies.

title: ollama-obsidian
summary: Obsidian plugin that brings private LLM assistance to your vault using Ollama.

title: ollama-elixir
summary: Elixir client for Ollama with GenServer behaviour for fault-tolerant integrations in Phoenix apps.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate providing strongly-typed async bindings to the Ollama REST API.

title: ollama-model-library
summary: Curated collection of Modelfiles for Llama 3, Phi-3, Mistral, CodeLlama, Gemma, etc.
